title: Executive Order 7005-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6832, of August 23, 1934, Making Funds Available for Expenses of the National Railroad Adjustment Board
content: Executive Order No. 6832, of August 23, 1934, making funds available for expenses of the National Railroad Adjustment Board, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7005-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6832, of August 23, 1934, Making Funds Available for Expenses of the National Railroad Adjustment Board  Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362683
